prompts: Create an adorable bunny-like Pokemon that loves to dig and play in the dirt.
Show me a Normal-type Pokemon with long ears and a fluffy tail, perfect for a forest setting.
Generate a cute creature with a brown and white color scheme, showcasing its playful personality.
Imagine a small Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, with distinctive floppy ears and a curious nature.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a rabbit, with unique features that make it stand out in battles.
Give me a Normal-type Pokemon with a round body and oversized ears, known for its speed and agility.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a playful rabbit, with a focus on digging and hopping.
